# Rgmdn

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Rgmdn is to offer a user a function to calculate the Geothmetic Meandian as popularized by xkcd:

![](https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/geothmetic_meandian.png)

## Installation

You can install the released version of Rgmdn from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jl5000/Rgmdn")
```

## Examples

```{r example}
library(Rgmdn)

gmdn(1,1,2,3,5)
gmdn(1:7)
```
